summary: Coleslaw is a popular side dish made of raw, shredded cabbage and a dressing. It comes from the Dutch word for 'cabbage salad'. The basic recipe is simple: cabbage and a dressing like mayonnaise or vinaigrette. People around the world have created many versions, adding things like carrots, onions, cheese, or fruits like pineapple, pears, or apples. This dish has been around since the 18th century in the Netherlands and is still a favorite today.
title: Coleslaw
